languages.text: "ДК-1 означает, что я — командующий отрядом Дельта-Кси. Это одно из наших обозначений для штурмовых отрядов в Коронусе. ВТ-1 — это вы, Вольный Торговец и глава Вита-Тета. Для краткосрочной миссии таких обозначений достаточно".

"DX-1 means I am in command of the Delta-Xi squad. It's one of our standard designations for strike teams in the Expanse. RT-1 is you, the Rogue Trader and leader of the Rho-Theta squad. For a short mission like this one, these identifiers should suffice."
languages.original_text: "ДК-1 означает, что я — командующий отрядом Дельта-Кси. Это одно из наших обозначений для штурмовых отрядов в Коронусе. ВТ-1 — это вы, Вольный Торговец и глава Вита-Тета. Для краткосрочной миссии таких обозначений достаточно".

traits.locale_text: "DX-1 means I am in command of the Delta-Xi squad — one of our usual designations for strike teams in the Expanse. RT-1 is you, the Rogue Trader and the leader of the Rho-Theta squad. For a short mission like this one, these identifiers should suffice."

"DX-1 means I am in command of the Delta-Xi squad — one of our usual designations for strike teams in the Expanse. RT-1 is you, the Rogue Trader and the leader of the Rho-Theta squad. For a short mission like this one, these identifiers should suffice."

"DX-1 means I am in command of the Delta-Xi squad. It's one of our standard designations for strike teams in the Expanse. RT-1 is you, the Rogue Trader and leader of the Rho-Theta squad. For a short mission like this one, these identifiers should suffice."

"DX-1 means I am in command of the Delta-Xi squad. It's one of our standard designations for strike teams in the Expanse. RT-1 is you, the Rogue Trader and leader of the Rho-Theta squad. For a short mission like this one, these identifiers should suffice."

languages.text: 「DX-1は私が『デルタ-Xi』チームの指揮を執っていることを意味します。これはエクスパンスにおけるストライク・チームの標準的な呼び方の一つです。RT-1はあなた、ローグトレーダーであり『ローシータ』チームの指揮官です。このような短い任務では、これらの識別子で十分でしょう」
languages.original_text: "DX-1 means I am in command of the Delta-Xi squad. It's one of our standard designations for strike teams in the Expanse. RT-1 is you, the Rogue Trader and leader of the Rho-Theta squad. For a short mission like this one, these identifiers should suffice."

traits.locale_text: 「DX-1は私が『デルタ-Xi』チームの指揮を執っていることを意味します。これはエクスパンスにおけるストライク・チームの標準的な呼び方の一つです。RT-1はあなた、ローグトレーダーであり『ローシータ』チームの指揮官です。このような短い任務では、これらの識別子で十分でしょう」

languages.text: «DX-1 significa que estoy al mando del escuadrón Delta-Xi. Es una de nuestras designaciones estándar para los equipos de ataque en la Extensión. Usted es RT-1, Comerciante Independiente y líder del escuadrón Ro-Zeta. Para una misión tan breve como esta, bastará con estos identificadores».
languages.original_text: "DX-1 means I am in command of the Delta-Xi squad. It's one of our standard designations for strike teams in the Expanse. RT-1 is you, the Rogue Trader and leader of the Rho-Theta squad. For a short mission like this one, these identifiers should suffice."

traits.locale_text: «DX-1 significa que estoy al mando del escuadrón Delta-Xi. Es una de nuestras designaciones estándar para los equipos de ataque en la Extensión. Usted es RT-1, Comerciante Independiente y líder del escuadrón Ro-Zeta. Para una misión tan breve como esta, bastará con estos identificadores».

languages.text: "DX-1 heißt, dass ich den Trupp Delta-Xi befehlige. Es ist eines Eurer Standardrufzeichen für Eingreifteams in der Ausdehnung. RT-1 seid Ihr, {mf|Freihändler und Anführer|Freihändlerin und Anführerin} des Trupps Rho-Theta. Für eine kurze Mission wie diese sollten diese IDs ausreichen."
languages.original_text: "DX-1 means I am in command of the Delta-Xi squad. It's one of our standard designations for strike teams in the Expanse. RT-1 is you, the Rogue Trader and leader of the Rho-Theta squad. For a short mission like this one, these identifiers should suffice."

traits.locale_text: "DX-1 heißt, dass ich den Trupp Delta-Xi befehlige. Es ist eines Eurer Standardrufzeichen für Eingreifteams in der Ausdehnung. RT-1 seid Ihr, {mf|Freihändler und Anführer|Freihändlerin und Anführerin} des Trupps Rho-Theta. Für eine kurze Mission wie diese sollten diese IDs ausreichen."

languages.original_text: "DX-1 means I am in command of the Delta-Xi squad. It's one of our standard designations for strike teams in the Expanse. RT-1 is you, the Rogue Trader and leader of the Rho-Theta squad. For a short mission like this one, these identifiers should suffice."

languages.text: “DX-1代表我是德尔塔-西塔小队的指挥官，这是我们的执法小队在科罗努斯扩区的标准行动代号。而RT-1指的是你，行商浪人，你是罗霍-塔乌小队的指挥官。对这样的短期行动而言，这样的代号应该已经够用了。”
languages.original_text: "DX-1 means I am in command of the Delta-Xi squad. It's one of our standard designations for strike teams in the Expanse. RT-1 is you, the Rogue Trader and leader of the Rho-Theta squad. For a short mission like this one, these identifiers should suffice."

traits.locale_text: “DX-1代表我是德尔塔-西塔小队的指挥官，这是我们的执法小队在科罗努斯扩区的标准行动代号。而RT-1指的是你，行商浪人，你是罗霍-塔乌小队的指挥官。对这样的短期行动而言，这样的代号应该已经够用了。”

languages.text: "DX-1, benim Delta-Hi mangasının başında olduğum anlamına geliyor. Bu, Enginlik'teki vurucu ekipler için kullandığımız standart tanımlamalardan biri. HT-1 ise Hür Tacir'i ve Ro-Thita mangasının liderini ifade ediyor. Bu türden kısa süreli bir görev için bu tanımlayıcılar yeterli olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "DX-1 means I am in command of the Delta-Xi squad. It's one of our standard designations for strike teams in the Expanse. RT-1 is you, the Rogue Trader and leader of the Rho-Theta squad. For a short mission like this one, these identifiers should suffice."

traits.locale_text: "DX-1, benim Delta-Hi mangasının başında olduğum anlamına geliyor. Bu, Enginlik'teki vurucu ekipler için kullandığımız standart tanımlamalardan biri. HT-1 ise seni, yani Hür Tacir'i ve Rho-Thita mangasının liderini ifade ediyor. Bu türden kısa süreli bir görev için bu tanımlayıcılar yeterli olacaktır."

languages.text: « DX-1 veut dire que je commande l'escouade Delta-Xi. Il s'agit de l'un des matricules standards pour les équipes d'attaque dans les Étendues. LM-1, c'est vous. {mf|Le libre-marchand et chef|La libre-marchande et cheffe} de l'escouade Lambda-Mu. Pour une mission aussi simple, ces identifiants suffiront.
languages.original_text: "DX-1 means I am in command of the Delta-Xi squad. It's one of our standard designations for strike teams in the Expanse. RT-1 is you, the Rogue Trader and leader of the Rho-Theta squad. For a short mission like this one, these identifiers should suffice."

traits.locale_text: « DX-1 veut dire que je commande l'escouade Delta-Xi. Il s'agit de l'un des matricules standards pour les équipes d'attaque dans les Étendues. LM-1, c'est vous. {mf|Le libre-marchand et chef|La libre-marchande et cheffe} de l'escouade Lambda-Mu. Pour une mission aussi simple, ces identifiants suffiront.
